transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Thank you sir.
Executive: Ji call kiye the Aaron Mart Private Limited se bol raha hu.
Customer: Hardesh ji baat kar rahe hai.
Executive: Exactly aapki baat aapke account manager se hui thi.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha ha bataiye na mam.
Customer: Accha sir aapne na aapki call mere paas to wo that's why maine aapko call kiya.
Executive: Sir koi concern hai aapka?
Customer: Kya cheez ke liye call kiye ho?
Executive: Sir aapki na call aayi thi mere ko.
Executive: Kab aayi thi sir hamare paas?
Customer: 1 tarikh ko sir receive hui hai mujhe call to actually na Saturday Sunday ki wajah se na office band the.
Customer: To pata nahi chala tha sir that's why maine aapko aaj connect kiya hai to sir koi koi concern sir koi problem aa rahi thi services mein?
Executive: Nahi nahi wo catalog update kiya hu aur kuch nahi hai mam catalog update hua hai.
Customer: Accha catalog theek hai sir to ye concern main close kar du aapko koi problem to nahi hai na?
Executive: Nahi abhi nahi hai kuch.
Executive: Mere ko na bas ye chahiye tha ki
Customer: Haan
Executive: Nearby jo apna hai na udhar se inquiry nahi aa pa rahe hai.
Customer: Matlab aap Chhattisgarh hi chahte hai basically.
Executive: Kya bole?
Customer: Chhattisgarh ke nearby chahte hai ya fir Chhattisgarh ke hi sirf andar se chahte hai.
Executive: Haan haan Chhattisgarh mein Chhattisgarh mein Chhattisgarh mein.
Customer: Chhattisgarh mein
Customer: se deal karna chahte hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir aap hi ka service use karte ho basically?
Executive: Ji
Customer: Ji abhi jo Poornima mam aayi hai wo bhi abhi service use karegi ya fir aap service?
Executive: Wo bhi dekhti hai wo bhi dekhti hai usko bhi update kar denge na to wo kar legi update.
Customer: Sir dekhiye abhi tak jo bhi by like hamari service to 24 se chal rahi hai 2024 se hai na but humne na us level pe service use nahi kari hai theek hai by leads wagera utni consume hui nahi hai hai na theek hai na humne calls pe utna action liya na hamare paas by leads pe utna hamara flow hai to sir main ye baat aapse bolna chahti hu ki aap pehle na abhi Chhattisgarh ke hai pehle proper aap Chhattisgarh mein jis jagah pe bhi apna catalog dikhana chahte ho jis is particular state mein mera dikhna chahiye is particular shehar mein mera dikhna chahiye us jagah pe aap do by leads week mein consume kariye waha pe aapka catalog visible ho jayega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Kya karna hai?
Customer: Ek hafte mein do by leads sir waha pe aapko consume karni hai taki aapka jo catalog hai waha pe visible ho jayega koi bhi search karega na wo product.
Executive: To mere ko inquiry inquiry karna padega kya?
Executive: Inquiry nahi sir jaise ki abhi main aapko call pe sir aapke paas IndiaMART abhi khula hua hai desktop pe?
Executive: Haan khula hai na.
Executive: Haan by leads ke section mein jaaiye sir.
Executive: Chale gaye.
Executive: By leads ke section pe abhi aapko kaha ki lead chahiye filter mein dekhiye.
Executive: Chhattisgarh ki chahiye?
Executive: Chhattisgarh ki sir jab tak dekhiye Chhattisgarh mein na abhi koi lead generate nahi hui hai to agar aap all location pe lagate hai ya nearby pe Chhattisgarh ke nearby ki koi jagah bataiye aap.
Executive: Jaha pe aap apna Raipur, Bilaspur
Executive: Right ek minute Bilaspur aur
Executive: Korba ye sab
Executive: Correct option select karke sir aap jab us particular by leads ka submit kar dete hai sir aap matlab ye main ye jaanna chah rahi hu sir ki aap apna ye jo by leads hai ye sirf Chhattisgarh ki sir aap ek product hai ye to product hai ki aap inko kahi pe bhi transport export kar sakte hai.
Executive: Transportation ki wajah se nahi kar rahe sir kyuki aap catalog jo hai log bahut achi tarike se dekh rahe hai iske madhyam se bhi log dekh rahe hai aur Lucknow wagera mein bhi dekh rahe hai Uttar Pradesh mein bhi dekh rahe hai aapke catalog ko logo ne view kiya hai Gujarat wagera mein bhi aur GST verified ya customer hai HR plant karke ek hai aur metal ek metal plate hai ek HR plate hai aur MS mild steel coils for construction thickness 2mm hai ye Madhya Pradesh se aayi hai ab ye aapki MS ek do piece apan de nahi payenge na quantity mein agar inquiry 50 tan 20 tan 30 tan tab apan kar payenge.
Executive: Accha accha okay.
Executive: Do piece teen piece ko kaise party wala bhi kaise le jayega transportation aur apan bhi kaise de sakte hai.
Executive: Samajh gayi hu main ye cheez sir maine na mam ko bhi bola tha aur aapki jab wo IndiaMART ki service proper use karna start kar de dekho sir pehli cheez to hume abhi active hona hai hum itne active hai nahi theek hai maine mam ko batao na mam ko thoda busy hu mam mam ko batao.
Executive: Mam ko maine sab kuch bata diya hai.
Executive: Fir se ek baar aur wo kar lijiye thoda busy hu mam.
Executive: Theek hai sir main bata deti hu.
Executive: Sir ye main call
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants nearby inquiries from Chhattisgarh.

- Customer is not actively using IndiaMART services.

- Customer cannot fulfill small quantity orders.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to filter buyleads by location.

- Executive suggested consuming two buyleads per week.

- Executive offered to inform the concerned person.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will inform the concerned person.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, catalog, service, inquiries
